item.title: The Kafirs Illustrated and series of drawings taken among the Amazulu, Amaponda, and Amakosa Tribes: also, portraits of the Hottentot, Malay, Fingo, and other races inhabiting Southern Africa: together with sketches of landscape scenery in the zulu country Natal and the cape colony
item.scopeAndContent: [Source - Benathi Marufu for FHYA, 2020: A digital copy of the book The Kafirs Illustrated and series of drawings taken among the Amazulu, Amaponda, and Amakosa Tribes: also, portraits of the Hottentot, Malay, Fingo, and other races inhabiting Southern Africa: together with sketches of landscape scenery in the zulu country Natal and the cape colony by George French Angas. To his excellency Major-General Sir Harry Smith, Bart. G.C.B. The administrator of the government and her Majesty High-commissioner to The Cape of Good Hope. London: Published by J. Hogarth, 5 HAYMARKET.]

event.eventDescription: This copy was downloaded from the internet. No information of who digitised the book is available at this time
